meta.hint:
A Suffix can be added to the end of a word. It changes the meaning of the word.
The suffix -ly means in a certain way. Example - Sadly means in a sad way.
The suffix -ness means the state of being. Example - Sadness means the state of being sad.
meta.question: Determine the meaning of a word with -ly or -ness

content.extra: the state of being happy,the state of being not happy
in a short way,not in a short way
in a incorrect way,in a correct way
the state of being cute, in a cute way
the state of being tired,in a tired way
